LanguageData.ZzZCOS_Relic.label: shrine of Victoriam
LanguageData.ZzZCOS_Relic.description: The statue appears to be a cast of the founder of the brotherhood High Elder Roger Maxon.
LanguageData.ZzZCOS_Altar.label: Cirlce of Steel terminal
LanguageData.ZzZCOS_Altar.description: A console that details the rules and regulations the Circle of Steel should follow. Mainly used by high ranking officers to train initiates in the teachings of Maxon.
LanguageData.Apparel_ZzZCOS_Book.label: Code of Steel
LanguageData.Apparel_ZzZCOS_Book.description: A full code on how the Circle of steel should operate as well as the original founding principles of the Brootherhood of Steel.
